articles.title: Spokesman for U.S. State Department Assailed for His Invectives against Election in DPRK
articles.content:
Spokesman for U.S. State Department Assailed for His Invectives against Election in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA on Thursday as regards the invectives let loose by the spokesman for the U.S. State Department against the election of the deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK:
					 As already reported, the election of the deputies to the 13th SPA successfully held on Mar. 9 in the DPRK strikingly demonstrated the absolute support, deep trust and indomitable will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to remain single-mindedly loyal to the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, holding him in high esteem as the unitary center of the unity and leadership.
					
					 All its citizens of the DPRK took part in the election to consolidate as firm as a rock the people's power chosen by themselves, fully enjoying their rights as the genuine masters of the state and society, and voted for the candidates with loyalty and patriotism.
					
					 The spokesman for the U.S. State Department was so impudent to say that there is no democracy as regards the election of deputies to the SPA. This is nothing but a ridiculous jargon of those who can not understand the advantageous election system of the DPRK as they are engrained with repugnance toward the Korean-style socialist system.
					
					 The U.S. had better feel ashamed of the American-style election which decides everything with fraud and swindle and its dollar-almighty election system in which a duck on a pond can be a president if it has money, and mind its own affairs before impudently finding fault with others.
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. may try to slander the social system of the DPRK and pull it down, its single-minded unity will be further consolidated and Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses will emerge victorious.

articles.title: Performances Given by Art Squads of KPA Units
articles.content:
Performances Given by Art Squads of KPA Units
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Performances were given at the Mansudae Art Theatre on Wednesday and Thursday by the art squads of the units of the Korean People's Army that proved successful at the 1st contest among art squads of the KPA.
					 Put on the stage were such numbers of diverse genres as chorus "Might of Korea", poem recital "Tell, Mt. Taedok, famous mountain for Songun", female quartet "Our dear supreme commander".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, a great man who has developed the KPA into President Kim Il Sung's and leader Kim Jong Il's invincible revolutionary army.
					
					 The audience was mesmerized by dialogic poem "We live under the roof of the supreme command," real story-telling "Great comrade-in-arms", mixed chorus "We long for his care most" and so on. These numbers fully reflect the pride of the service personnel who are leading a worthwhile life as genuine and eternal comrades-in-arms, sharing will, heart and destiny with their supreme commander, finding the worth of living on the road of the Songun revolution. 
					
					 Also staged were dramatic sketch "Two squad leaders in the training ground", male solo and pangchang "At one go", guitar ensemble "Song of Coast Artillerymen" and chorus "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order". These numbers truthfully represent the service personnel who prepare themselves as a-match-for-a-hundred fighters and protect the defence line of the country as firm as an iron wall, always keeping themselves highly alerted. 
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers reflecting the strong faith and will of the service personnel who will firmly carry forward the tradition of the army of Paektusan and the great tradition of defending the leader unto death, the lifeline of all generations to come, having Kim Jong Un as the supreme commander of the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 Among the audience were officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, creators, artistes, teachers, researchers and students in the field of literature and arts and members of art squads in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Winning Final Victory of Revolution
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Winning Final Victory of Revolution
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The election of the deputies to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was a grand political festival that strikingly demonstrated the steadfast faith and will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to win final victory of the revolution under the leadership of the great Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Fully demonstrated in the election was the firm will of the service personnel and people to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, the revolutionary cause of Songun, holding in high esteem supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the helm of the WPK and the Korean revolution. 
					
					 Also clearly demonstrated in the election was the absolute support and trust of all service personnel and people in the DPRK government.
					
					 The Korean people are substantially provided with political freedom and right as the masters of the state and society under the care of the DPRK and are enjoying an equal and happy life thanks to the popular policies.
					
					 All of them took part in the election of the deputies to the 13th SPA and voted for the candidates. This is an eruption of their unanimous desire and warm patriotism to glorify the DPRK as an invincible power and a cradle of life of the generations to come under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 All the party members, service personnel and other people should steadily rev up the surging atmosphere and wage a dynamic general offensive to further demonstrate the dignity and invincible spirit of Songun Korea.
					
					 The DPRK government will always emerge victorious thanks to the tested leadership of the great WPK and the might of the single-minded unity of all service personnel and people.

articles.title: Meari Shooting Gallery
articles.content:
Meari Shooting Gallery 
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Meari Shooting Gallery, located at the foot of a hill in Chongchun Street here has been remodeled recently. 
					 An increasing number of people go to the gallery to spend enjoyable time.
					
					 Kim Yong Ho, deputy manager of the gallery, told KCNA that the Meari Shooting Gallery provides shooting, sports and amusements services.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The indoor gallery houses the 25-meter pistol range, 50-meter rifle range, archery ground, ray gun range and electron gun range.
					
					 The shooters are awarded prizes when getting high marks, while children getting the knack of shooting in the electron gun range.
					
					 Pak Nam Song, a student of the Hanggu Senior Secondary School in Hanggu District, Nampho City, said he felt as if he were a master shot when he was shooting at wild animals displayed on screen.
					
					 I will study harder in the future to repay the loving care shown by the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, he said.
					
					 Visitors can also shoot at living animals at the outdoor range and take food prepared with them.
					
					 The gallery also has tennis, badminton and volleyball courts.
					
					 Song Yon Hyang, an employee, said that many foreigners visit the gallery. One of them said that he was deeply moved by the loving care shown by Marshal Kim Jong Un for the people, she added.

articles.title: National Sci-Tech Presentation for Evergreen Turf Held
articles.content:
National Sci-Tech Presentation for Evergreen Turf Held 
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological presentation for cultivating evergreen turf took place at the Turf Institute Branch of the State Academy of Sciences on Thursday. 
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, teachers and postgraduate students in the fields of urban management and land management. 
					
					 The presentation was divided into the panels of seed-breeding and selection, prevention of damage by harmful insects, cultivation and conservancy and IT. 
					
					 At least 30 papers were presented by the Turf Institute Branch and the Bioengineering Branch of the State Academy of Sciences, Wonsan University of Agriculture and other units. 
					
					 Papers were appreciated for having great practical significance in breeding new species of green turf and creating and tending lawns suited to climate and soil of the country. 
					
					 Also drawing the attention of the participants were successes made in the researches into gathering and preserving turf resources and clarifying their biological characters and achievements made in the researches into preventing them from insects and developing green nutritive liquid.

articles.title: Passive Solar Heating Introduced in DPRK
articles.content:
Passive Solar Heating Introduced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Passive solar heating has been introduced on a wide scale in the DPRK.
					 The Central Heating Institute under the Ministry of Urban Management has pushed ahead with introducing the system into dwelling houses and public buildings.
					
					 In this regard, Ko Myong Sok, a section chief of the institute, told KCNA:
					
					 The passive solar heating is very economic as it is low in material consumption.
					
					 The solar heating is mainly based on endothermic paints which are very effective in raising indoor temperature.
					
					 It has been applied to some apartments and public buildings in Mangyongdae District, Pyongyang.

articles.title: Normalization of Japan-DPRK Relations Called for
articles.content:
Normalization of Japan-DPRK Relations Called for
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting for commemorating the 8th anniversary of the Citizens Solidarity in Osaka Demanding Earlier Normalization of the Relations between Japan and the DPRK took place in Higashinari, Osaka on Feb. 21.
					 Present there were more than 200 Osaka citizens and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The meeting began with the playing of piano by Yukie Ikebe, chairman of the Japan-Korea Society for Music and Art Interchange, on the theme of friendship and peace.  
					
					 Masaaki Arimoto, co-representative of the Citizens Solidarity in Osaka Demanding Earlier Normalization of the Relations between Japan and DPRK, made an address.
					
					 He said that 8 years have passed since the formation of the solidarity, but the normalization of relations between the two countries has not yet been realized. He underlined the need to oppose the Japanese authorities' militarist lurch to the right and realize the normalization of relations between Japan and the DPRK at an early date.
					
					 Masahiro Tanba, head of the Osaka Defense Counsel for Judging the Tuition-Free Program for Senior High Schools, said in a lecture that the exclusion of Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools is an act quite contrary to Japan's constitution and international human rights law, and a human rights abuse that should never be allowed.
					
					 To defend the education right of the Korean schools is the struggle against the authorities' militarist lurch to the right and for the solidarity movement for peace in East Asia, so it is an important issue for Japanese people themselves, not confined to the Korean schools only, he noted. 
					
					  He called for positively joining in the action to win the trial of the tuition-free program for senior high schools.
					
					 A written request addressed to the Japanese prime minister was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: IS Dismantlement Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
IS Dismantlement Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress and other civic and public organizations of south Korea held a press conference at the Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul on Mar. 10 at which they called for dismantling the Intelligence Service (IS), according to Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 At the press conference speakers accused the IS of perpetrating organized crimes such as faking up evidence and forging spying case.
					
					 The facts explain the reason why the IS should be dismantled, they charged.
					
					 The prosecution authorities should make a thoroughgoing probe into the truth about the case fabricated by the IS and punish those involved in it, they held, warning that the prosecution authorities would face strong resistance of people if they turn down these demands.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Policy of Discrimination against Women Protested
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Policy of Discrimination against Women Protested
						
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Representatives and workers of labor organizations of south Korea including the Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a meeting in Seoul on Mar. 8 demanding the authorities roll back the policy of discrimination against women, according to the south Korean newspaper Labor and World. 
					 The chairman of the KCTU said that the wretched plight of women workers who are unreasonably dismissed en masse, without being guaranteed their vital rights, shows that it is very hard for women to live on this land.
					
					 A member of the Solidarity for Healthcare of the Public Transport Trade Union said that the hospital side is driving part-time nurses like a beast of burden and dismissing them before the expiry of the term of contracts, adding the misfortunes would go on unless such practices are discontinued.
					
					 A member of the Seoul branch of the Metal Trade Union said that she turned out in the action as she could no longer bear the inhuman acts on the part of the management.
					
					 A resolution was read out at the meeting.
					
					 It said that women are undergoing double or treble pains as the present chief executive has not taken any measure.
					
					 The women on this land will stage a dynamic action to have stable jobs free from any discrimination guaranteed, conditions for childcare provided and part-time jobs abolished, it noted.
					
					 At the end of the meeting its participants staged a demonstration.

articles.title: Suicide of Old People Increases in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suicide of Old People Increases in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The suicide rate is increasing among old people of south Korea, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo on March 10.
					 The Asian human rights commission expressed concern over the fact that the suicide rate of people above the age of 65 has recently increased more than four times in south Korea.

articles.title: Cancellation of "Basic Plan for Defense Reform" Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Cancellation of "Basic Plan for Defense Reform" Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a press conference on March 7 urging the Ministry of Defense to cancel the "basic plan for defense reform".
					 At the press conference speakers recalled that the ministry set forth the plan the keynote of which is to adopt an active deterrence strategy for taking preemptive countermeasures when a sign of an all-out war is detected on the Korean peninsula and build various units including a submarine command, flying corps, tactical air control group, flight information group and satellite monitoring and controlling corps.
					
					 The strategy adopted in the draft reform is reckless one which may lead to an all-out war as it applies the "tailored deterrence strategy" aimed to make a preemptive attack on the north, they charged.
					
					 They said that the plan should be cancelled at once as it was more retrogressively revised than the previous one.
					
					 They underlined the need to thoroughly react to the behavior of the military authorities revealing the aggressive nature and increasing the people's burden only.

articles.title: Anyone Can Be Branded as Spy in S. Korea: Lawyer
articles.content:
Anyone Can Be Branded as Spy in S. Korea: Lawyer
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on March 11 carried lawyer Kim Yong Min's article on the spying case sparking off public furor recently. 
					 The article recalled that a suspected spying case which shocked all south Koreans turned out to be not guilty. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 When the case ended with a poor detective story jointly cooked up by the Intelligence Service's unsubstantial investigation, unreasonable indictment of the prosecution and irresponsible reports of media, the Intelligence Service produced new evidence, but it was officially confirmed that the evidence was also fabricated. 
					
					 A new spying case can be cooked up anytime under the present social system in which the Intelligence Service is not monitored and controlled. 
					
					 It is necessary to bear in mind that anyone can be branded as a spy as long as the Intelligence Service is allowed to fake up evidence and make spies.

articles.title: Seriously Burnt Worker Completely Cured
articles.content:
Seriously Burnt Worker Completely Cured 
 Hamhung, March 13 (KCNA) -- The South Hamgyong Provincial People's Hospital saved a worker from a critical condition in 60 odd days.
					 Ko Kye Hyon fell unconscious after getting third-degree burns on 40 percent of his body. 
					
					 As soon as he was admitted to the hospital on January 6, medical workers of the hospital started treatment after taking reasonable urgent measures at consultative meetings.
					
					 Doctors and nurses succeeded in helping the patient recover his senses four days later. Then a series of skin grafting were conducted. They made every sincere effort to cure him, sitting up by his bedside all night. 
					
					 Not only medical workers and employees of the hospital but also teachers and students of Hamhung University of Medicine donated their blood and flesh for skin-grafting operations. 
					
					 Thanks to their sincere devotion, Ko was completely cured to return to his worksite. 
					
					 Experiencing himself this stirring reality in which people of different social standings showed such sincerity for the life of an ordinary worker, Ko and his family members expressed profound thanks to the benevolent socialist society where revolutionary comradeship is in full bloom. 
					
					 Ko left the hospital amid the warm farewell of all well-wishers on March 11.

articles.title: China's State Council on Human Rights Situation in U.S.
articles.content:
China's State Council on Human Rights Situation in U.S. 
 Beijing, March 12 (KCNA) -- An article of the Information Office of the State Council of the People's Republic of China was posted on the Chinese website Xinhua Network recently. 
					 The article said that the U.S. in its State Department's "Country Reports on Human Rights Practices for 2013" cooked up by deceptions and fabrications pointed an accusing finger at many countries of the world, styling itself the "world judge of human rights". 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 In fact, the human rights issue of the U.S. in 2013 is still grave and the human rights situation is steadily worsening in many fields.
					
					 In 2013, 137 people died in 30 mass killings, which caused four or more deaths each, in the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. engaged in a tapping program, code-named PRISM, exercising long-term and vast surveillance both at home and abroad. The program is a blatant violation of international law and seriously infringes on human rights.
					
					 About 80 000 U.S. prisoners are in solitary confinement in the country. Some have even been held in solitary confinement for over 40 years.
					
					 The U.S. still faces grave employment situation with its unemployment rate remaining high. The homeless population in the U.S. kept swelling and it had climbed 16 percent from 2011 to 2013. 
					
					 Racial discrimination systematically exists in U.S society. The situation of ethnic minorities' human rights is grim.
					
					 Sex discrimination is still serious, and children's rights are not well protected in the United States.
					
					 Recalling Uncle Sam has carried out a lot of drone strikes in Pakistan, Yemen and other countries causing many innocent civilians dead, the article bitterly condemned the U.S. as the worst abuser of human rights of peoples in other countries.

articles.title: Leaders' Instructions Seen Anywhere in DPRK: Chinese Paper
articles.content:
Leaders' Instructions Seen Anywhere in DPRK: Chinese Paper
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Chinese paper Huan Qiu Shibao carried an article contributed by its correspondent in Pyongyang under the title "Leaders' instructions seen anywhere in DPRK" on Mar. 7.
					 The article noted:
					
					 The Korean people are applying aphorisms of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un in their work and life.
					
					 The leaders' instructions are quoted in all newspapers and books of the DPRK and are of weighty significance in the people's daily life.
					
					 Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's works are on display in the libraries of the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean people are attaching great importance to aphorisms of their leaders.
					
					 They study hard all the speeches of Kim Jong Un to deeply grasp their contents.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made the New Year Address on Jan. 1 this year.
					
					 The Korean people deeply studied his New Year Address.
					
					 The leaders' instructions displayed at public places look solemn and truthful.
					
					 The instructions can be seen everywhere in the DPRK.

articles.title: Korean Photo, Book and Fine Art Exhibitions Open in China
articles.content:
Korean Photo, Book and Fine Art Exhibitions Open in China
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Korean photo, book and fine art exhibitions opened in Yingkou City of Liaoning Province and Tangshan City of Hebei Province, China on March 7 and 8.
					 Displayed on the front walls of the exhibition halls were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display there were photos of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed were works of the peerlessly great men, photos and books introducing Songun Korea and fine art pieces showing the talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremonies were Chinese personages of various circles and a delegation of the Korean Overseas Exhibition General Bureau.
					
					 Chinese speakers in their speeches said there is no such a leader in the world as Kim Jong Il who dedicated his all to the happiness of the people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 They continued:
					
					 Kim Jong Un is a leader revered by the world people. The future of the DPRK is rosy as it is led by Kim Jong Un who is identical to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 China has very close ties with the DPRK. The Chinese people always regard the Korean people as friendly and fraternal people.

articles.title: U.S. Slammed for Taking Issue with DPRK over Its Rocket Launching
articles.content:
U.S. Slammed for Taking Issue with DPRK over Its Rocket Launching
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Some days ago the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army successfully conducted rocket-launching drills, demonstrating the highest-ever rate of hits of ultra-precision weapons for the defense of the country.
					 The U.S., taken aback by the drills, branded them as a "violation of resolutions" of the UN Security Council and urged the international community to cope with them appropriately.
					
					 The U.S. secretary of State also let loose a spate of vituperations against the DPRK, terming it an "evil place" and a "country of evils."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 This is nothing but a death cry of those astounded by the self-defensive power of the DPRK and its rapid development in the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The U.S. reckless provocation is just a smear campaign of wicked guys shocked by the peace-loving stand of the DPRK.
					
					 If a climate for reconciliation is created and peace and stability settle in on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity, the U.S. military policy and foreign policy for aggression aimed at carrying out its strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region will end in smoke. Worse still, the U.S. will lose its initiative in the issue of the Korean peninsula, and also not a few arms markets.
					
					 It is clear that the U.S. is a very mean villain and rogue state which seeks to fish in troubled waters by inciting the confrontation between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 It is better for the U.S. to behave itself, knowing if the sun rises in the east or west and how the world affairs develop.
					
					 The DPRK regards vituperations let loose by the U.S. as exhausted screams of old hooligans making desperate efforts to sustain their waning life.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the U.S. arrest the victorious advance of the DPRK.

articles.title: Portavoz de DECAM se entrevista con ACNC por "caso de petrolero" ocurrido en Libia
articles.content:
Portavoz de DECAM se entrevista con ACNC por "caso de petrolero" ocurrido en Libia
 Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del "caso de petrolero" de nacionalidad coreana ocurrido recientemente en Libia, el portavoz de la Direccion Estatal de Control de Asuntos Maritimos (DECAM) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 12 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC:
					 El pasado dia 8, el gobierno libio exigio por via oficial a nuestra parte tomar medidas pertinentes por el caso del petrolero de nacionalidad coreana "Morning Glory" diciendo que este barco contrajo un contrato comercial de petroleo con un grupo armado individual de ese pais y entro ilegalmente en un puerto en el oriente de Libia bajo el control de ese grupo.
					
					 El petrolero, operado por la Compania Golden East Logistics en Alejandria de Egipto, ha adquirido temporalmente la nacionalidad coreana por un plazo de 6 meses segun el contrato firmado a finales de febrero pasado entre esa compania y nuestra parte.
					
					 Tan pronto como recibieramos el aviso de la parte libia, hemos reprochado fuertemente a la compania egipcia por la violacion del contrato y le demando que ordenara al petrolero salir de inmediato del puerto mencionado sin cargar el petroleo.
					
					 Ademas, informamos oficialmente al gobierno libio y los organos correspondientes de la Organizacion Maritima Internacional que cancelamos la nacionalidad coreana y el registro del polemico barco y anulamos todos sus certificados, ya que el violo la ley de registro de embarcaciones coreanas y el contenido del contrato de no transportar los materiales ilegales ni entrar jamas en los puertos situados en las zonas en guerra y conflicto y de desastres naturales.
					
					 Por lo tanto, actualmente, "Morning Glory" no tiene nada que ver con nuestra parte y no nos recae ninguna responsabilidad.
					
					 El problema es que algunas fuentes extranjeras vinculan intencionalmente el caso con la RPDC reportando que el "barco norcoreano intento comprar ilegalmente el petroleo en Libia" y el "ejercito gubernamental libio disparo contra el petrolero con la bandera nacional norcoreana".
					
					 Algunas fuerzas inducen en error la opinion publica relacionando de continuo el problema con la RPDC, lo cual parte de su siniestro objetivo politico de manchar la imagen de ella.
					
					 Ellas deben saber claro que no podran mellar la imagen de la RPDC con ninguna demagogia o chismografia.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a lograr victoria final de la revolucion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a lograr victoria final de la revolucion
 Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- En el editorial divulgado este jueves, el diario Rodong Sinmun subraya que las elecciones de diputados a la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fueron gran festival politico que demostro sin reservas la inconmovible conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y pueblo de Corea de lograr a toda costa la victoria final de la revolucion bajo la direccion del gran partido.
					 A traves de las elecciones, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea hicieron constar su firme conviccion de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, enalteciendo al Mariscal Kim Jong Un al maximo puesto del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la revolucion, senala el editorial y continua:
					
					 Igualmente, se conocieron otra vez que todos los militares y habitantes apoyan y confian absolutamente en el poder de la RPDC.
					
					 En el regazo de la RPDC, el pueblo coreano, siendo dueno del Estado y la sociedad, ejerce la libertad politica y derechos autenticos y lleva una vida equitativa y feliz gracias a las politicas populares.
					
					 Esta vez, todos los electores votaron a favor expresando su unanime determinacion patriotica de glorificar la RPDC, bajo la direccion del Mariscal mediante el Songun, como potencia invencible y nido de vida para todas las generaciones venideras.
					
					 Al seguir elevando el entusiasmo de hoy, todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del ejercito popular y los habitantes deben librar la ofensiva general para demostrar sin reservas la dignidad y el impetu invencible de la Corea del Songun.
					
					 Gracias a la probada direccion del Partido y al poderio de unidad monolitica entre el ejercito y el pueblo, el poder de la RPDC saldra siempre victorioso.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza acusacion de EE.UU. sobre ejercicio de lanzamiento de cohetes
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza acusacion de EE.UU. sobre ejercicio de lanzamiento de cohetes
 Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, las fuerzas estrategicas del Ejercito Popular de Corea realizaron el lanzamiento de cohetes demostrando la punteria certera de las armas superprecisas para la defensa de la patria.
					  Muy asustado, Estados Unidos armo un revuelo insistiendo en que ese lanzamiento es una "violacion de la resolucion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU" y urgiendo la "reaccion pertinente de la sociedad internacional".
					
					  El secretario de Estado norteamericano se atrevio a criticar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como "lugar perverso" y "pais del mal".
					
					  Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico el jueves un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					  La acusacion de EE.UU. no pasa de ser el estertor de los asustados ante el desarrollo vertiginoso de la capacidad de autodefensa nacional y la construccion de Estado prospero socialista en la RPDC.
					
					 Si se da el clima de reconciliacion y llegan la paz y la estabilidad a la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno, se llevara al fracaso la politica militar agresiva y la exterior de EE.UU. de implementar la estrategia de dominar a Asia-Pacifico.
					
					 Ademas, el imperio puede perder el control en el problema de la Peninsula Coreana y hasta los mercados de armas.
					
					  Se puede conocer que EE.UU. es el pais mas sucio y bribon del mundo que trata de sacar provechos de la confrontacion entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					  Aunque EE.UU. se porte muy mal, la RPDC seguira avanzando victoriosamente.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC condena chismografia sobre recientes elecciones de diputados
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC condena chismografia sobre recientes elecciones de diputados
 Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que un vocero del Departamento de Estado de Estados Unidos calumnio las recientes elecciones de diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del MINREX de la RPDC dio el dia 13 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					 Como ya trascendidos, a traves de las elecciones de diputados a la XIII Legislatura de la APS realizadas con exito el dia 9 en nuestro pais, quedaron manifestados el apoyo absoluto, la confianza y la indoblegable voluntad de nuestros militares y habitantes de apoyar siempre con fidelidad al Mariscal Kim Jong Un teniendolo como unico centro de la unidad y la direccion.
					
					 Ejerciendo plenamente sus derechos como duenos verdaderos del Estado y la sociedad, todos los ciudadanos de la RPDC participaron como un solo hombre en las elecciones para consolidar el poder popular optado por si mismos y votan a favor dando muestras de su fidelidad y patriotismo. Esto es la realidad de nuestro pais.
					
					 Pero, un portavoz del Departamento de Estado estadounidense censuro atrevidamente las elecciones de diputados a la APS aduciendo la falta de democracia.
					
					 Esto no pasa de ser una sofisteria de los que habituados a vetar el regimen socialista al estilo coreano, no comprenden ni podran comprender la superioridad del regimen electoral de la RPDC.
					
					 Antes de criticar a otros, EE.UU. debe limpiarse su nariz sintiendo verguenza de su sistema electoral en que el fraude y la estafa deciden lo todo y el dolar convierte en el presidente hasta al pato en un lago.
					
					 Aunque EE.UU. esta desesperado para calumniar y derrocar el regimen de nuestro pais, nuestra unidad monolitica se tornara mil veces mas solida y nuestro socialismo centrado en las masas populares seguira avanzando victoriosamente sin vacilacion alguna.

articles.title: Tiene lugar funcion de grupos de propaganda artistica del EPC
articles.content:
Tiene lugar funcion de grupos de propaganda artistica del EPC
 Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 12 y 13 en el Teatro de Arte Mansudae la funcion de los grupos de propaganda artistica del Ejercito Popular de Corea, seleccionados al primer concurso de los mismos.
					 En la escena se interpretaron el coro "La fuerza de Corea", la recitacion de poesia "!Cuenta, el famoso monte Taedok del Songun!", el cuarteto femenino "Nuestro querido Comandante Supremo" y otras piezas.
					
					 Los ejecutantes elogiaron en tono patetico nobles personalidades del Comandante Supremo del EPC Kim Jong Un quien fortalecio el EPC como poderoso ejercito revolucionario de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					 La narracion de historia verdadera "Gran companero de armas" y el coro mixto "Es mejor su regazo" y otras piezas describieron el orgullo de los militares que buscan el valor de su vida en el camino de la revolucion del Songun y viven como verdaderos camaradas y eternos companeros de arma que comparten con su Comandante Supremo el mismo proposito y el mismo destino.
					
					 La pieza teatral corta "Dos jefes de escuadra en el lugar de entrenamiento", el solo masculino y Pangchang "De un tiron" y el coro "Ordene, Lider" demuestran de modo impresionante la figura de los uniformados que se preparan como soldados capaces de combatir a solas contra cien enemigos y defienden el frente de la patria manteniendo siempre el estado de alerta.
					
					 Hay otras piezas que reflejan la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de todos los oficiales y soldados de continuar el linaje de las fuerzas armadas del monte Paektu y la gran tradicion de defensa a ultranza al lider, que son linea vital de todas las generaciones, teniendo al Comandante Supremo del EPC en el maximo puesto de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					 Disfrutaron el espectaculo los funcionarios del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los creadores, artistas, profesores e investigadores y los estudiantes de la rama de cultura y arte, los miembros de los grupos de propaganda artistica de esta ciudad.
